_header: Thou that in prayers has been lent

BLAru285.First Lines: THow that in prayeris hes bene lentIn prayaris and in abstinance…
BLAru285.Last Lines: …And seillit agane Is thy remissiounTo Riss with him fra ded to lif

Banna.First Lines:
Thow þat hes bene full obedientto god be prayeris and
                    abstinence…
Banna.Last Lines:
…and selit agane is þi remissioun To ryse with him fro
                    deid to lyfe
